## ClashManager class

A clash manager - to fetch and store clash tournaments and related data.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ClashManager implements BaseManager<Tournament> 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [BaseManager](./shieldbow.basemanager.md)<!-- -->&lt;[Tournament](./shieldbow.tournament.md)

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [cache](./shieldbow.clashmanager.cache.md) |  | Collection&lt;number, [Tournament](./shieldbow.tournament.md)<!-- -->&gt; | The in-memory cache of tournaments. |
|  [client](./shieldbow.clashmanager.client.md) |  | [Client](./shieldbow.client.md) | The client that instantiated the manager. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [fetch(id, options)](./shieldbow.clashmanager.fetch.md) |  | Fetches a tournament by its ID. |
|  [fetchAll()](./shieldbow.clashmanager.fetchall.md) |  | Fetch all upcoming and active tournaments. |
|  [fetchByTeamId(teamId)](./shieldbow.clashmanager.fetchbyteamid.md) |  | Fetch tournament by participating team's ID. |
|  [fetchPlayer(summonerId)](./shieldbow.clashmanager.fetchplayer.md) |  | Fetch participation info of a summoner in tournaments by the summoner ID. |
|  [fetchTeam(teamId)](./shieldbow.clashmanager.fetchteam.md) |  | Fetch a team participating in a tournament by the team ID. |
